Kota Madiun Jadi Proyek Percontohan Program ‘Smart City’
07 Nov 2019, 08:44 by Eka Wulan


Kota Madiun Jadi Proyek Percontohan Program ‘Smart City’

KBRN, Madiun : Walikota Madiun, Maidi menerima penghargaan 100 pemerintah daerah pelaksana pilot project Smart City dari Menteri Komunikasi dan Informatika (Menkominfo), Jonny G Plate. Penghargaan tersebut diberikan saat acara Prsidential Lecture di Balai Sudirman, Jakarta pada Rabu (6/11/2019).
Maidi mengatakan, pada acara tersebut semua perencanaan Smart City sudah dievaluasi oleh tim penguji termasuk dari Kominfo. Paparan yang disampaikan Maidi pun dinyatakani lolos. Dengan begitu, pihaknya akan berkoordinasi dengan jajaran OPD untuk melaksanakan program tersebut.
“Masterplan kita sudah bagus dan sudah sesuai dengan apa yang diinginkan masyarakat. Kemudian hasil jerih payahnya semua pihak selama empat bulan ini akhirnya mendapat penghargaan dari pemerintah pusat, tinggal nanti kita jalankan saja,” ungkap walikota, Kamis (7/11/2019).
Lebih lanjut walikota menyatakan, penghargaan yang telah diraih akan dijadikan penyemangat pemkot untuk mengimplementasikan konsep kota cerdas. Terutama dalam melaksanakan program di enam pilar smart city. Mulai smart governance, smart branding, smart economy, smart society, smart living, dan smart environment.Program yang sudah dan akan dijalankan pemkot,diantaranya mewujudkan PeceLand, perekaman pajak bagi wajib pajak dan elektronik parkir.
Karena itu, Maidi mengajak seluruh elemen masyarakat ikut berperan aktif mewujudkan Smart City. Sebab untuk menggagas program tersebut tidak mudah, terbukti Kota Madiun menjadi salah satu daerah yang masuk dalam 100 kabupaten/kota se Indonesia yang akan mewujudkan Kota Cerdas. (Foto: Diskominfo)

Kota Madiun Becomes a Pilot Project for the 'Smart City' Program
Nov 7 2019, 08:44 by Eka Wulan


Kota Madiun Becomes a Pilot Project for the 'Smart City' Program

KBRN, Madiun: Mayor of Madiun, Maidi received the award of 100 local governments implementing the Smart City pilot project from the Minister of Communication and Information (Menkominfo), Jonny G Plate. The award was given during the Prsidential Lecture at Balai Sudirman, Jakarta on Wednesday (11/06/2019).
Maidi said, at the event all Smart City plans had been evaluated by a team of examiners, including those from Kominfo. The presentation delivered by Maidi was declared to have passed. By doing so, his party will coordinate with the ranks of OPD to implement the program.
"Our master plan is good and is in accordance with what the community wants. Then the results of all the efforts of all parties during these four months finally received an award from the central government, we will just run it later, "said the mayor, Thursday (11/07/2019).
The mayor further stated, the award that had been won would be used as an encouragement to the city government to implement the concept of smart cities. Especially in implementing programs in the six pillars of smart city. Start smart governance, smart branding, smart economy, smart society, smart living, and smart environment. Programs that have been and will be run by the municipal government, including realizing PeceLand, recording taxes for taxpayers and parking electronics.
Therefore, Maidi invites all elements of society to play an active role in realizing Smart City. Because to initiate the program is not easy, it is proven that Madiun City is one of the 100 regions / cities in Indonesia that will realize Smart Cities. (Photo: Diskominfo)
